title: [Large-scale] Training on Using Content Acquisition Podcasts (CAPs) for Physical Education of Visually Impaired Children

context.prior_knowledge: General foundational knowledge in physical education
context.additional_context: Mobile-Based Intensive Short-Term Training for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers to Strengthen Physical Education Competencies for Visually Impaired Children

learning_goals: Learners can explain foundational knowledge required for physical education for visually impaired children, including sensory integration and assistive device usage
Learners improve confidence by over 80% when designing physical education classes for visually impaired children using CAPs
Learners can apply five or more practical strategies presented in podcast content to actual classroom instruction
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
